column2: BNK Petroleum says to sell shale assets to Exxon March 17 Oil and gas exploration and production company BNK Petroleum said on Sunday it had agreed to sell most of its assets in Oklahoma's Tishomingo Field to Exxon Mobil Corp for $147.5 million to fund its exploration program and repay debt.
Dow Jones investigates bribery allegations against WSJ China March 17 Dow Jones & Co said it found no sign of impropriety at its China operations
column3: after the Wall Street Journal reported that a whistleblower had accused Journal employees of bribing Chinese officials for information.

column2: Disney's 'Oz' keeps magic spell on movie box office March 17 Walt Disney Co's "Oz the Great and Powerful" reigned over movie box offices in its second weekend
